website_summaries.verdict: A durable heavy duty precision planer that comes with an equally durable case.
pros: DEWALT's planer has a maximum cut of 3/32 inches per pass and it features a calibrated knob for quick, easy and accurate depth setting
Additionally, this tool has 3 precision machined guides which allow for 3 distinct beveling channels
cons: The lack of a dust collector makes this tool a little less desirable for those who do not enjoy cleaning up

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I am a 65 year old woman and I make river tables this dewalt planter works so much better than my old one. I had two contractor bags full of 20 year old walnut saving. And it took about two days and I didn't even go up to 3-1/4-inch . Best tool ever !
customer_reviews.author: Sandra E.

customer_reviews.title: No dust bag option.
customer_reviews.text: The planer works great, but not only does it not come with a dust bag, none is available. I just got off the phone with DeWalt, who assure me that no bag or adaptor is available for purchase that fits the tear drop shaped dust port on the side of this planer. DeWalt recommended that I return the planer and purchase a 5.5 amp model that can fit to a dust collection bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt Saves my Project
customer_reviews.text: The Harbor Freight electric hand planer I bought lasted through 2 projects and broke in the middle of the 3rd project, a walnut coffee table. When this arrived I took it out of the box and 30 minute later was ready to sand with my belt sander. Beware that this planer will take a bit off even when set to "0". So try it on scrap first. Works great and heavy duty so holds up fine to hard woods. Thanks DeWalt!
customer_reviews.author: KellyV_Ark

customer_reviews.title: Great portable planer
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I can find to dislike about this planer is it is not battery operated and the cord can get in the way occasionally. However, I purchased this non-battery planer specifically because it wasn't battery powered so I don't really hold that against it. Otherwise I found the planer easy to use and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product even with a cord
customer_reviews.text: If cordless isn't that important, you will like this planer. Bought mine to replace much older DW677. They are functionally identical. A cheaper DeWalt model is available, but I think the 680K is superior. You get what you pay for in these Chinese tools. Takes both carbide and steel blades. Changing process on DW680K is easier/better.
customer_reviews.author: M. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: WOW ! great job Dewalt
customer_reviews.text: What a great tool I just finished planing a large glue lam table top, this planer is a beast, it leaves a very nice finish. it produces a lot of chips so you need to buy the chip collector fitting as well. I purchased it, however it did not arrive with the rest of my order, so I had some clean up to do, no problem though I used my stainless steel works shop shop vac witch works great. Buy both with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Joel G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfection.
customer_reviews.text: Works as you would expect. The case is nice. Extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had bought this years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a planer before, but now I can't imagine life without one. This is a terrific unit, and I am getting good use out of it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bret Waters

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this years ago 2012 I haven’t used it that often, like, it’s not a commercial application but my experience with it has been that it works very well and I like it a lot, it’s great tool
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for professional woodworker who raved about it. It was being used within one hour after delivery. Good heavy-duty motor. Also purchased extra blades to have on hand. Better to go with 7 Amp model as the motor is better and will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Spark

customer_reviews.title: Great Planer
customer_reviews.text: What a great tool. I used it to clean up salvaged/reclaimed wood. I did not need a bench planer or jointer to make a nice coffee table. However, it helped that I had a belt sander and and a table saw.. I was easy to learn to use and easy to adjust the depth of cut.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves it. Sadly, I bought the corded plainer as my husband prefers battery operated so he can take it anywhere. But still, a great tool that works great and he loves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just the right tool
customer_reviews.text: For planing good doors, etc., where a skill saw is just too much, you will be hard pressed to beat this planer. Very precise depth settings and very smooth results. It is more powerful that I expected and I would definitely buy it again. Use this outside on in a shop where you have sawdust management. It really creates a mound of chips in a hurry! Probably 25x faster than a hand planer with precise depth of cut.
customer_reviews.author: KCL

customer_reviews.title: Cleanly removes wood with easy of control
customer_reviews.text: Really nice planner. Smooth and easy to adjust. Blades appear easy to change. Only thing wish I had a dust bag for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: This is a great planer! It has much more power than the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great planer! It has much more power than the smaller Dewalt planer and comes in a nice case
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: great for small surface areas
customer_reviews.text: this planner works real well on small surface areas. I have no problems with it keeping the correct depth and will cut a long length without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good planer but not enough adjustment
customer_reviews.text: This planer works great but will not adjust down to zero. I use it set as low as possible and still take more wood off than i would like at one time. Very seldom do I use the adjusting knob to get a deeper cut because it hogs off too much. I had the DW677 model of this planer that would adjust to where it didn't cut anything, so it was possible to cut a very small amount. I don't know if it is assembled wrong or what. Also blade replacement on this model doesn't look as easy as my DW677 model was although I have not had to replace them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Faye Davis

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: I have seen this used in boat yards. Haven't had a chance to use it yet, but delivery was quick! Plan to use this to remove old crumbly gelcoat without the uneven surface created by grinding wheels. Not really its intended purpose, but I know it works. Specialty gelcoat peelers can cost upwards of $1200.
customer_reviews.author: P. Young

customer_reviews.title: Fine Machine
customer_reviews.text: I had recently painted in my 45-year-old house, and some of my doors needed to be trimmed down because the paint had built up over 45 years, causing the doors to stick. Since I had several doors to do, I did NOT want to resort to a hand planer. So I invested in the DeWalt, based on earlier experience with other DeWalt products. As before, the DeWalt was suberb. I planed the doors down is several thin passes, and it was smooth as silk. Easy to operate with excellent results -- what more could I want? Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jinde

customer_reviews.title: Can't find this one in the stores.
customer_reviews.text: I love this older dewalt planer model. Smooth and easy to control. Sometimes I wish dewalt would leave well enough alone and stop revamping their tools that are working great.
customer_reviews.author: hummbabe00

customer_reviews.title: A real work horse
customer_reviews.text: Decided to replace my hand planers with a power planer. (Yeah, I am pretty much old school, but I figured if I carry a power saw it would be good to have a power planer to.) I've used it on both soft wood and hard wood and it performs flawlessly. Excellent addition to my collection of power tools.
customer_reviews.author: Buster's Hideaway

customer_reviews.title: a must have tool for the shop,...or man cave
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Dewalt planer because I did not have the room for a power joiner......it does the job as a hand held power unit. Will recommend to my do it your selfers...
customer_reviews.author: Survey magic man

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt DW680K
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected. Powerful easy to use. Wishes: Front Adjustable blade knob moves too easily when using it to guide planer. Should be a lock mechanism. Wish there was a dust collector bag. Switch lock button could be larger and/or set back for easier use with thumb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, haven't had to remove the blades yet but can't imagine it being a problem. Makes a very nice surface with little sanding needed after use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Planer - Makes a great jointer
customer_reviews.text: I love this planer! I also have Dewalt's thickness planer, but this thing is so excellent to use as a jointer. I just put a board in a vise bench and I can run this planer right on the side of a board to make a square edge before cutting it on the table saw.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Bland

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. First time using a planer and it worked great. Made a butcher block bench top and it leveled everything out quite well.
customer_reviews.author: jpi

customer_reviews.title: need  better instructions
customer_reviews.text: nice, cuts great, easy to use. not sure how to use the blade setup gauge that comes with it,, in the instructions but i can't make sense of them. bad instructions in my view.
customer_reviews.author: kt

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: 7 amps of power makes all the difference! Great planer! operates easily and quickly. But be prepared for the shavings....I virtually flocked my whole garden shed when I planed down the door for a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised how useful this planner proved to be.
customer_reviews.author: Uvaldo

customer_reviews.title: Just a little Narrow
customer_reviews.text: I like this tool, but I wish it were 1/2 an inch wider. At 3.25" wide, it is just a little narrow to plane a 2x4. It can plane the edge, but when planing the face of the board, it leaves a very narrow lip that needs to be gone over a second time; this leads to uneven planing.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Deschene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it works just fine on treated wood. blending in new joist with old. works good
customer_reviews.author: jack of altrades

customer_reviews.title: A nice planer at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and was a boom for trimming the shutters for our windows. Easy to set up and use. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M. Strong

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only complaint is the way it sits in its case. It moves around and tears the box and itself up.
customer_reviews.author: cummins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s a DeWalt what more can I say. Have never had a problem with any of my DeWalt tools.
customer_reviews.author: David A Glaum

customer_reviews.title: Portable Planer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great portable planer. Holds up well. I work with old wood, doors, lots of stuff out of plumb.Great for field work and easy to use. Replacement blades are reasonably priced. Good product, takes a lot of abuse,handles old work well.
customer_reviews.author: jon a. thulin

customer_reviews.title: did a good job of taking a little off new doors and ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced some doors in our house ,did a good job of taking a little off new doors and still keeping them straight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did what I wanted it to do - but...
customer_reviews.text: This planer did a terrific job and it's first challenge was on Hickory. However, I found my self chasing the cord all the time. The cord is like a wet noodle and in fact within the first hour I cut the cord and had to splice and eventually replace the cord. The machine worked terific but the constant keeping up with the cord made it uncomfortable to work with. Yes, I would buy it again but I would hope that DeWalt can change the cord configuration and flexability to let the user concentrate on the work instead of where the cord is tracking
customer_reviews.author: Steve C. Larabee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dang fine hand planer. Great price and works as hoped for!
customer_reviews.author: Mark in NWOregon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what I was missing until I got this Dewalt Planner. I used to shave doors with a old fashioned hand planner. This does the same job in seconds and smooth! I love it and carry it with me in my business.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Miller

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt  Number 1 again
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe I havent had this tool before now never again will I hand plane another door again. This planer is very easy to setup and with dial control made it real easy. The planer didnt even slow down going through paint. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F. Goettl

customer_reviews.title: A tool I thought I could live without
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most useful power tools I have ever bought. I have used it to perfectly trim doors and moldings, strip paint off of old redwood fence posts to make them look new, adjust cabinet shelves for a perfect fit, etc. etc. I used to dread planing with a hand planer. It never was easy and results were less than perfect. This machine changes all of that. It is so fast and easy. Results are professional.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: well balanced - easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for varied projects. It has made potentially difficult projects go quickly and easily. Be sure to start with small settings until you get used to the amount of material it will take off during a single pass.
customer_reviews.author: photo shooter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tool
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! Cuts through wood literally like hot butter. Fantastic results even on hard wood!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Bonasio

customer_reviews.title: I have always had good performance from this brand and expect to get a ...
customer_reviews.text: This tool was added to my collection of Dewalt tools. I have always had good performance from this brand and expect to get a lot of work done with this planer.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Worked great but what a mess
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a tool, used a hand planner before and this thing just eats up the wood and leaves a smooth surface. Don't know how I lived before with just the hand planner. Used inside on a doorway that wasent straight, cut away approx. 1/2 inch of wood sticking out keeping door frame from being plumb, worked great but what a mess, had wood chips everywhere. This thing puts out a cloud of dense wood love it. Also like the plastic container box, noticed Dewalt using cloth bags for some of their products, never cared for that. Another great Dewalt product.
customer_reviews.author: frosty

customer_reviews.title: I'm a rookie
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great out of the box. Handy, balanced, great job. Maybe I'm to new at woodworking to know any differnt, but this thing is great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W

customer_reviews.title: Like any other DeWalt tool... A+
customer_reviews.text: I'm a supervisor of a furniture factory, and we are in a plain process of renewing tools, we are buying almost all branded DeWalt and it's been great!!, and the planner wasn't the exception, tought it was a small machine, it works perfectly and very clean shaped. very recommended!! the only critic I make is that this product was sent without any long trip shipping consideration, just in its plain original box...
customer_reviews.author: Jose De Freitas

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: good product and works well. Great value and came with nice carrying case. Its a bit heavy but other than that its great.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Spearman

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing don't have to sand afterwards.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this planer and it works amazing. Great quality and value. Well worth it. As always dewalt pleases with another great product.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt tools class act
customer_reviews.text: Yes thank you . Dewalt is a excellent quality tool ,would recommend it to everyone that is hard on there tools meaning use them regularly and expect them to perform every time they are picked up
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy tool. It comes in very handy for planing down the edeges of doors that are sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery L. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a professional. Took a bit of getting ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a professional. Took a bit of getting used to. I guess I was looking to use this to feather and really couldn't. It planes to the depth you set it.
customer_reviews.author: DPDUB

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy.
customer_reviews.text: Unit meets my expectations. Arrived punctually. Bought to rough (read rustic) plane a cedar slab table. Gave me what I wanted and more. As I'm in Pacific NW, I'd have appreciated a shavings collection design; it rains some here and working inside generates a major garage cleaning. Taken in the main, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Fredrickson

customer_reviews.title: Stupid design.
customer_reviews.text: My bad, it does not come with a dust collector and only exhausts the chips in one direction - right into your face on the right side. Keep looking, there must be better designed planers out there.
customer_reviews.author: Hjul

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Dewalt makes quality tools wouldn't buy any other. Great planer
customer_reviews.author: Wesly Moreau

customer_reviews.title: Used product was sent
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a new planer however I received a used planer. Was not expecting this from Amazon. I am returning the item for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: S. Naqvi

product_meta.title: DEWALT Hand Planer, 7-Amp, 3-1/4-Inch (DW680K)
product_meta.description:
Style:Planer3-1/4" Heavy duty planer kit, 5.2A, 15, 000 RPM, with 3/32" Depth of cut, rubber coated height adjustment knob, kick Stand, Poly-V belt, precision machined shoe on bottom & sides, 3 chamfer grooves & accepts high speed steel & reversible carbide blades, includes edge guide, metal kit box & 2 Reversible carbide blades.

AMAZON.COM
If you’re a serious woodworker, than the DEWALT DW680K planer is a necessary addition to your woodworking shop. The rugged 7 amp, 15,000 rpm motor produces steady, level results on even the toughest applications. This planer features increased function and quality with up to 3/32-inches of cut in a single pass and an increased amount of passes allowed with handy kick stand. The DW680K is compatible with reversible carbide blades that are equipped for resharpening and ideal for straight edge or framings. A precision-machined shoe maintains even results and produces perfectly square rabbet joints and is crafted with three precision machined guides in the front generate three distinct beveling channels. Features include the innovative Calibrated Depth Adjustment Knob to ensure positions are fine-tuned so you never have to re-zero the depth and height adjustment knob, ergonomically set in rubber for increased height command. It’s easy to operate with comfortable two finger trigger to reduce exhaustion for extended use and equipped with poly-v drive belt for strengthened longevity. Planer includes two reversible carbide blades, rabbeting fence, and rugged carrying case.
feature_bullets: The product is easy to use
Heavy-duty 7.0 Amp motor provides a smooth, even finish in the hardest of woods
3/32-inch (2.5-milimeter) maximum cut in one pass reduces the amount of passes on your material
Accepts large resharpenable high speed steel blades for straight edging or framing applications
Calibrated Depth Adjustment Knob for accurate depth setting and eliminating the need to re-zero your depth
Also accepts reversible carbide blades for more detailed, accurate woodworking; Precision-machined shoe bottom and side provides flat surface finish as well as accurate and square rabbet joints

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars159 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
